T02D3377:52b-1: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3377:52b-3: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3377:52b-4: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3377:52b-5: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas zla ba la bhr'um
T02D3377:52b-6: dkar po yongs su gyur pa las zhal gsum spyan
T02D3377:52b-7: gsum ma / lang tsho gsar la bab pa /
T02D3377:52b-8: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bza' dang ldan pa /
T02D3377:52b-9: phyag brgyad pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma bsam par bya'o //
T02D3377:52b-10: ser po dang nag po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
T02D3377:52b-11: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang /
T02D3377:52b-12: padma la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /
T02D3377:52b-15: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang /
T02D3377:52b-16: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhabs pa dang /
T02D3377:52b-19: mchod rten gyi phug gi khong na gnas par bskyed la /
T02D3377:52b-20: padma la gnas pa'i sa bon snying gar bsam par bya'o //
T02D3377:52b-21: de'i rjes su spyi bo dang /
T02D3377:52b-25: rkang pa rnams su go rims bzhin du h'um tr'am
T02D3377:52b-26: hr'i:aam aa:zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i rnam par bsam par
T02D3377:52b-29: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3377:52b-30: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
